test_cases.notes: POST validates priority, frontend submits with error handling.
PATCH endpoint works, frontend passes ID correctly.
DELETE works with proper ID passing and error handling.
GET with priority param works, frontend filter updates list.
Backend sort=due_date param matches frontend, sorting works.

summary: All user stories implemented correctly. Core functionality works with proper error handling.
recommendations: Add ability to mark tasks as incomplete (undo complete)
Add task editing functionality in frontend
Add persistent storage instead of in-memory
Consider adding task categories or tags
